verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Chereko chereko na vifijo,
waumini wote pigeni makofi,
Yesu aliyekufa msalabani
leo hii amefufuka). x2
(Tufurahi na tushangilie,
Yesu Kristu leo kafufuka
Aleluya tuimbe aleluya). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kwa maringo tunaimbaimba,
kwa maringo tunachezacheza,
twafurahi Bwana Yesu Kristu
amefufuka.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hoye hoye na nderemo nyingi
na vinanda pia tuvipge,
twafurahi ukombozi wetu
umetimia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yeye ndiye mshinda mauti,
yeye ndiye shujaa wa vita,
yeye ndiye mshinda shetani
amefufuka.
